Pancho's Tacos Home of the Jumbo Burrito - Our Food Is Our Word
Capturing the Heart of Mexican Style and Flavor Enjoy Fast Food Mexican Cuisine at Our Restaurant Dine In • Takeout
Traditional Mexican Food from the Beginning . . . The talented family chefs at Pancho's Tacos have treated our customers to the exotic, robust flavors of authentic Mexican tacos, enchiladas, and burritos . With more than 26 years of professional experience, the owners of our restaurant, our chefs, and our staff of friendly servers strive to provide you with the perfect dining experience—a blend of authentic Mexican cuisine in the relaxed, casual atmosphere only found south of the Rio Grande. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner with us today, where seating is available for up to 60 people. Comfortable, Mexican-Style Atmosphere From our comfortable booths and tables to our authentic Mexican artwork and décor, our restaurant transports you to the heart of Mexico. While you enjoy our traditional Mexican foods, you can almost feel the gentle tropical breezes, hear the distant sounds of bustling Mexican caminos, and taste the mouthwatering aromas of tortillas, fresh cheeses, and juicy meats from the local markets.
Mexican Cuisine with Unsurpassed Quality Because our chefs are passionate about their work, our restaurant creates dishes exclusively from the freshest ingredients and the finest traditional Mexican recipes. Corn and flour tortillas, crisp lettuce, succulent tomatoes, tender, juicy meats, and savory spices make every item on our menu a delectable treat. Whether you tackle a plate of our famous Jumbo Burritos or try our awe-inspiring Burrito Loco, our food will warm your heart and satisfy your taste for adventure. In addition to our famous burritos, we also offer a salsa bar, soft drinks, and specialty Mexican drinks to enjoy with your meal.
Authentic recipes, delicious food, and relaxed Mexican-style atmosphere— contact us or visit our restaurant today!
